name: commiseration
content:
commiserations [ plural ]
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of sympathy for someone, especially someone who has lost a competition: Commiserations on losing the match!
See more
[ U ] a feeling or expression of sympathy for someone about some bad luck: She gave me a look of commiseration as I entered the room.
